column14: Overall I like this body wash. It has a light scent that is not overpowering or super sweet like other body washes I've tried. I've also had body washes that leave a film/residue on my skin but I dont notice that with this one. My only reason for docking a star is because it's pretty expensive for only a 5oz bottle.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: The NB Body Line - Hydrating Body Cleanser is a treat for the skin. First off, it smells divine with strong citrus overtones. It's a gel that goes on smoothly and lathers up to a light creamy texture. It feels so soft on the skin. As it rinses off, my body feels smooth and hydrated.

column6: It's alright, but a small bottle.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: It's alright... but I probably wouldn't get it again, basically because the bottle is sooooo small for $15. It's only 5 ounces. This is the size of bottle that some of my face washes have come in. It isn't going to last very long when you are using it all over your body. The smell is a bit like citrus. I didn't research this brand so I don't know if it's some fancy brand that is well known or not. It's nice to have if you want something natural and gentle without harsh chemicals but I'm probably just going to go back to my Dove or Caress bodywashes.
